pizzerias.name: Pizza Circus
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Especial (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón dulce, piña, maíz)
pizzerias.description: Family-friendly pizzeria with circus-themed decor near Sagrada Familia. Their Hawaiian pizza includes sweet corn, a popular addition in Spanish variations of this international favorite.

pizzerias.name: La Bella Napoli
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicale (salsa de tomate, mozzarella fior di latte, jamón cocido, piña fresca)
pizzerias.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria operating in Barcelona since 1979. Despite their traditional leanings, they offer a Hawaiian-style pizza using imported Italian ingredients and fresh pineapple.

pizzerias.name: Pizzería El Born
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiana Catalana (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón serrano, piña caramelizada, rúcula)
pizzerias.description: Modern pizzeria in the trendy El Born district. Their Catalan twist on Hawaiian pizza substitutes standard ham with serrano ham and adds arugula, topped with caramelized pineapple.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria La Nova
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Picante (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón, piña, jalapeños, cebolla roja)
pizzerias.description: Neighborhood pizzeria offering good value and generous portions. Their spicy Hawaiian adds jalapeños and red onions to the classic combination for extra flavor.

pizzerias.name: NAP Antic
pizzerias.specialty: Ananás y Jamón (salsa de tomate San Marzano, mozzarella fior di latte, jamón cocido, piña asada)
pizzerias.description: Neapolitan Authentic Pizza (NAP) serves traditional Neapolitan-style pizzas using premium imported ingredients. Their Hawaiian variation features roasted pineapple for enhanced flavor.

pizzerias.name: Pizzería Sports Bar
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Five-O (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón, piña, bacon)
pizzerias.description: American-style sports bar serving pizzas late into the night. Their Hawaiian pizza includes bacon alongside ham for extra flavor and is popular with the late-night crowd.

pizzerias.name: Bráva Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Piña Brava (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, piña caramelizada, jamón ibérico, chiles, miel)
pizzerias.description: Gourmet pizzeria focusing on innovative combinations with high-quality ingredients. Their premium Hawaiian replaces regular ham with ibérico ham and adds chili peppers and honey.

pizzerias.name: La Pizzería de l'Hort
pizzerias.address: Carrer del Torrent de l'Olla, 138, 08012 Barcelona
pizzerias.specialty: Tropical Ecológica (salsa de tomate orgánico, mozzarella, jamón ecológico, piña fresca, albahaca)
pizzerias.description: Organic pizzeria using locally-sourced and ecological ingredients. Their Hawaiian pizza features organic ham and fresh pineapple sourced from sustainable producers.

pizzerias.name: Pizza Dojo
pizzerias.specialty: Tokyo-Hawaii Fusion (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón, piña, teriyaki, sésamo)
pizzerias.description: Fusion pizzeria blending Japanese and Italian influences. Their unique Hawaiian pizza includes teriyaki sauce and sesame seeds for an Asian twist on the classic.

pizzerias.name: Margherita
pizzerias.specialty: Hawai di Napoli (salsa de tomate San Marzano, mozzarella di bufala, prosciutto cotto, piña confitada)
pizzerias.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizzeria in the heart of El Born. Their upscale Hawaiian pizza uses buffalo mozzarella and candied pineapple for a gourmet interpretation.
